channel.title: The Urban Frontier
channel.description:
Each program in this series considers one of the major life activities people carry on in an urban setting. The format is narrative with dramatized interludes.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: On the seventh day
item.description: An examination of the role of the worshipper in modern American cities.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: NAEB Region VI: The West

item.title: Rendezvous
item.description: A look at some of the opportunities and problems faced by people who are new to urban areas.
